member.name: STARTING_VCN_INPUT_BUFFER
member.summary: Contains the starting VCN to theFSCTL_GET_RETRIEVAL_POINTERS control code.

member.name: STARTING_VCN_INPUT_BUFFER.StartingVcn
member.summary: The VCN at which the operation will begin enumerating extents in the file. This value may be rounded down to the first VCN of the extent in which the specified extent is found.
